name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 14, Hunan. A blind path was occupied by a lamp post, and a national flag was hung on the post. The photographer said that blind people passing by here might be hit and bleed. How is the municipal engineering designed?
One netizen replied: "Are you not patriotic?" "It's worth falling under the national flag"
Another netizen said that blind people are unlikely to hit the post with a cane. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj1xv7KbsAA1reh.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Gansu. A woman said that her parents died when she was young, and she started from scratch to establish 4 companies and paid over 100 million yuan in taxes, which helped local villagers get rich. She also donated to the society. However, she was persecuted by local officials and imprisoned. The company's assets were also sold at a low price by the government, causing the company to go bankrupt. The woman said: Don't private enterprises deserve to survive? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890796561623662593/pu/img/SIbq4QZ_sq2IOmIz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Shangrao, Jiangxi. Veteran Zhang Tianjian said that he participated in the nuclear test and risked his life to rush into the nuclear explosion area to record data. He dedicated his youth to China's nuclear industry. However, he is now weak and sick. Because he did not give gifts or money, he has not been assessed as disabled and cannot receive pension. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj2AEY8acAAlsU2.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Shandong. A man stole the food from the delivery boy's car, and the boy chased the man all the way to catch him. The man knelt down to apologize to the delivery boy, saying that he had not found a job, had been hungry for two days, and his phone was out of battery. The delivery boy said that it was not easy for him to deliver food. Finally, under the plea of passers-by, the delivery boy let the man go. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890840339789090816/pu/img/5pa3dC1Ggk0nkpdx.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 15, the annual Xi'an Chang'an Lingzhao Feng Village Tiger Shooting (Community Fire) was spontaneously held under the strong push of the majority of villagers. Previously, on the 12th, the local government issued a notice prohibiting the holding of this year's Tiger Shooting in the name of narrow roads, which aroused the dissatisfaction of the villagers. The villagers posted the relevant videos online and called on the people around Xi'an to come and watch the performance.
On the 15th, the villagers announced that they would spontaneously organize a community fire parade. It is said that there were about 70,000 to 80,000 people on the scene that day. On the day of the event, the local public security arranged a large number of police officers to go to the scene to maintain order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplement: On February 14, the old man held up a banner and questioned the police, who retreated repeatedly.
A large number of villagers gathered in front of the village committee to negotiate with relevant personnel and succeeded, and the scene was full of jubilation https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890846388147085313/pu/img/MjRoeP_wVUnAnLcz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video version: Ukrainian President Zelensky delivered a speech at the Munich Security Conference, saying that in the face of continued threats from Russia and uncertainty about US support, Europe must rely on itself for defense. He called for Europe to have its own armed forces. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890866759332241408/pu/img/gSn1TS-HalL8Olp7.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://x.com/whyyoutouzhele/status/1889266244018122782

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A family member of a kidnapped victim of telecom fraud asked for help on Xiaohongshu:
Phase 4 of the Baolong Park in Poipet, Cambodia, is full of Chinese people. A Chinese was beaten to death during the Chinese New Year on February 2.
The Cambodian government sent military police to investigate, but they rescued the Koreans and not a single Chinese. I hope the country can rescue the Chinese people inside. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj3FgHqXAAAlDVZ.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As of now, there has been no follow-up to the explosion at the Dadong Non-staple Food Market in Shenyang.
On February 10, a blogger uploaded a video of visiting the Shenyang Dadong Non-staple Food Mall. From the video, it can be seen that the entrance of the mall has been restored to its original state, as if the explosion had never happened. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890901188582703104/pu/img/DvQU8pEM0tdEksff.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Republican Senator Graham: "We must ensure that we are deeply integrated economically with Ukraine to make it a cordon sanitaire. If we reach a mineral agreement with American companies in Ukraine, it will become more difficult to invade. At the same time, we need to continue to enhance the combat effectiveness of the Ukrainian army, arm them to the teeth, give them a batch of F-16 fighter jets, and make any future invasion extremely difficult. This is a deterrent in itself. If Ukraine cannot join NATO now, my idea with Boris Johnson is to send a very clear message - tell Putin that if he invades Ukraine again, it will trigger Ukraine's automatic joining of NATO and become another cordon sanitaire. As long as we do these three things, he will not launch an invasion again. Otherwise, we will be back to square one and repeat the same mistakes."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Shanghai. The woman filmed a street in Xuhui District. More than a dozen shops along the street were closed. Some shops were open, but their business was not satisfactory. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890992232507002880/pu/img/Y1cvahJt-t7YweiY.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
US President Trump posted a message today claiming that "those who save the country do not break any laws."
This sentence comes from Napoleon, the military and political leader who ruled France in the 19th century. Napoleon enacted the "Napoleonic Code" in 1804 and then proclaimed himself emperor.
The Democratic camp quickly criticized Trump. California Senator Adam Schiff wrote on the social platform X: "The tone is no different from a real dictator." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj5WTE9aQAAmopQ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15 (Released) A BYD anchor flipped over while demonstrating the automatic parking function of BYD Ocean to the audience in the live broadcast room, and it is suspected that it collided with other vehicles. It is reported that the car is equipped with the "Eye of God" intelligent driving system. Netizens joked: "Is God blind?" "Why didn't God open his eyes?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891049123601846272/pu/img/rqj0M-38pLOOe_gt.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many netizens gave Captain America 4 a one-star bad review in order to support the domestic film Nezha 2. The netizens who gave bad reviews said: "Love China, dear compatriots"
"Whoever watches Captain America will get sick"
"I want Captain America to die in China!" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj5dX9laUAAv-IS.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 15, Guangyuan, Sichuan. Pacific Cinemas: To support "Nezha 2", this theater will not consider scheduling "Captain America 4" for the time being. I hope all fans will understand.
https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891054243278467072/pu/img/5pN0Pd3v60Or_0dq.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Taiwan media reported that the US State Department updated the current situation of US-Taiwan relations and deleted the statement that it does not support Taiwan independence on its official website.
Less than a month after US President Trump took office, the US State Department updated the current situation of US-Taiwan relations on Thursday (February 13). The third paragraph of the website deleted the statement "We do not support Taiwan independence" and added the expectation that the differences between the two sides of the Taiwan Strait can be resolved through "freedom rather than coercion, and in a way that is acceptable to the people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj5kFdJawAA1lCn.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The foreign ministers of South Korea, the United States and Japan held talks in Munich, Germany and issued a joint statement supporting Taiwan's participation in appropriate international organizations. Analysts believe that the content is clearly aimed at China and reflects the Trump administration's tough policy line toward China.
South Korean Foreign Minister Cho De-yeol, US Secretary of State Rubio, and Japanese Foreign Minister Iwaya Takeshi attended the meeting on Saturday (February 15) local time.
According to a press release issued by a US State Department spokesperson, the three parties emphasized in the joint statement the importance of maintaining peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait, encouraged the peaceful resolution of cross-strait issues, and opposed any unilateral attempt to force or coerce to change the status quo. The three parties also expressed support for Taiwan's meaningful participation in appropriate international organizations.
According to the official website of the Taiwan Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Taiwan Foreign Minister Lin Chia-lung responded to the above joint statement and expressed sincere welcome and gratitude.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Kellogg, U.S. President Donald Trump's special envoy for Ukraine, said Saturday that Europe would not have a seat at the table in the Russia-Ukraine peace talks.
In a follow-up to the meeting, Kellogg sought to reassure the Europeans, saying that did not mean that European interests were not being considered.
But European leaders said they would not accept being left out of the talks.
"Without the Europeans, we cannot discuss or negotiate about Ukraine, Ukraine's future or the European security structure," Finnish President Stubb told reporters in Munich. "But Europe needs to come together and do more than talk."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zelensky expressed dissatisfaction with Trump's negotiation with Putin without his consent, believing that such a sequence was more dangerous. He stressed that in his communication with Trump, he proposed that a common view must be reached first, and stressed the importance of Europe in the negotiations, reiterating that Ukraine's future belongs to the EU. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891068012100468736/pu/img/TFWoy7MKPIypx1r3.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
US Vice President Cyrus Vance's comments on the European political situation caused an uproar, and the German Defense Minister's off-script rebuttal was applauded.
Regarding the "firewall" ridiculed by Vance, German Defense Minister Pistorius emphasized that "democracy does not mean that the noisy minority is right" and "democracy must be able to defend itself against extremists who want to destroy it."
On February 14, German Defense Minister Pistorius, who also took the stage at the Munich Security Conference shortly after Vance's speech, said at the beginning that he had prepared a speech, but after hearing Vance's speech, he could no longer speak according to the original content and had to respond to Vance's speech.
Pistorius said, "If I understand correctly, he compared the situation in some European countries with authoritarian regimes," "and this is unacceptable."
As soon as the words fell, a long applause broke out in the venue dominated by European politicians to express their support for the German Defense Minister...
fullContent:
美副总统万斯讥评欧洲政局引哗然 德防长脱稿驳斥获喝采。
 对于万斯所嘲讽的“防火墙”，德国防长皮斯托里乌斯强调，“民主并不意味着吵闹的少数派就是对的”，“民主必须能够自我防卫，以抵御那些想要摧毁它的极端主义者”
 2月14日，在万斯演讲不久之后也在慕尼黑安全会议登台的德国国防部长皮斯托里乌斯开场就说，自己原本准备了演讲稿，但在听到万斯的谈话之后，自己不能再按照原本准备的内容发言，而必须对万斯的讲话有所回应。
 皮斯托里乌斯说，“如果我理解得没错，他把部分欧洲国家的状况与专制政权作比较”，“而这是不可接受的。”
 此语刚落，以欧洲政界人士为主的会场便响起了一阵长长的掌声，以表达对这位德国防长的声援。
 隶属社民党的皮斯托里乌斯接着反驳万斯道，在德国，每种观点都得以发声，这还使得选择党这种“局部的极端主义政党”，可以像其他政党一样正常竞选。他还介绍道，德国选择党的总理候选人魏德尔在周四晚上，也可以和其他总理候选人一样，出现在德国黄金时段的电视节目中。
 对于万斯所嘲讽的“防火墙”，皮斯托里乌斯强调，“民主并不意味着吵闹的少数派就是对的”，“民主必须能够自我防卫，以抵御那些想要摧毁它的极端主义者。”
 针对特朗普政府在乌克兰问题上的立场和近来的涉俄表态，这位德国防长也不假辞色。他在2月13日回应美国防长赫格塞斯的表态时称，“我认为这很笨拙。我认为这是一个错误”，“把(乌克兰的)北约成员身份和潜在的领土变化放在谈判桌上谈，会更好”。
 在特朗普决定与普京就乌克兰问题通话前，美国事先没有通知其他北约盟友或乌克兰。对此，皮斯托里乌斯说，如果欧洲国家要一起参与，维护任何形式的俄乌和平协议，那么欧洲国家将必须参与谈判。
 不过，他对特朗普呼吁欧洲国家将国防支出提高至GDP的5%则表示乐观其成。
 皮斯托里乌斯说，“没有人能再相信超过2%就够了”，他还呼吁，即使美国希望将其安全重心转向印太地区，并减少对欧洲的防务支出，“这是合理的，但就此，必须有一个逐步过渡的路线图”。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The international anti-corruption organization "Transparency International" released the 2024 Corruption Perception Index Report. The report shows that Denmark has topped the list for seven consecutive years with 90 points. China still ranks 76th, but has increased by one point. Taiwan ranks 25th. The 2024 report shows that about 6.8 billion people in the world live in countries with a corruption perception index below 50 points, accounting for 85% of the world's total population. Transparency International, headquartered in Berlin, Germany, collects data from 13 groups of expert evaluations or business opinions to calculate the Corruption Perception Index. The index ranges from 0 to 100 points, with 0 being the most corrupt and 100 being the most honest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Four years ago, during the 720 flood in Zhengzhou, Li Kunpeng rushed into the deep water with a kitchen knife and used it to chop open the car window, saving three people. He is affectionately called "Cleaner Brother"
Recently, his family said that Li Kunpeng had a sudden illness recently and his heart stopped beating. He is still in a coma. The cost of treatment has cost more than 100,000 yuan. Faced with the high cost of treatment, the family had no choice but to seek help from all walks of life. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891081151533682688/pu/img/cLBK8wrhii0tsFeq.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Tang Yuwen, a teacher at Guangxi Baise Qifu Middle School, sexually assaulted female student Fu Yuehua, causing Fu Yuehua to commit suicide in January 2025.
On February 15, a video released by her sister showed that the trunk was filled with flowers sent by netizens. There were also several messages to Fu Yuehua. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891085500137799680/pu/img/REwFO2RkLQJ_WuF_.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. A delivery boy lies on the ground to defend his rights. The boy said that he did not go back to his hometown during the Chinese New Year, and he has been running orders. Recently, he asked for leave from the site leader because of a fever, but was rejected. So he worked in the rain for another morning, and went home in the afternoon because he couldn't stand it anymore. As a result, he was fired by the site manager, and his salary was settled at 3 yuan per order, and the rent was also deducted. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj5-8heaEAAJrmC.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was revealed online that a middle-level employee of Jiangsu Huashe Group Design Institute publicly questioned his leader in a group chat on the Lantern Festival: I have no face to face employees who only earn 2,490 yuan and have to impose heavy workloads on them. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj6DxfRa4AADn-z.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was revealed that if you wear a kimono and take photos and post them, you need to mark it as "Patriotic Version/China Red Version" or write a patriotic message in the copy, otherwise you may be attacked. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj6HoZbbEAAxnP7.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 15 (Release) A Chinese student posted that the teacher asked each student to answer the reason for coming to Poland as an exchange student. She answered: Poland has disappeared three times in history, and even during the COVID-19 period, Poland almost disappeared, so I want to visit this country before Poland disappears again. As soon as she finished speaking, the teacher's face turned black.
She said she regretted saying this and didn't expect the teacher to be angry, but she did think so in her heart. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj6OPHObwAAiZiB.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiwan's Ministry of National Defense said that on February 16, when the Canadian warship "Ottawa" passed through the Taiwan Strait, it discovered 24 Chinese military aircraft, 18 of which crossed the median line of the Taiwan Strait and entered the air defense identification zone. These Chinese military aircraft are conducting "joint sea and air combat readiness patrols" with warships deployed around the island. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj6TRjPbQAA0u9s.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15 (Released) A Chinese student said that Russia is really poor now. A friend sent 500 down jackets to Russia, but they were detained by customs for more than 20 days. He paid more than 8,000 yuan in storage fees before they were released. Doing business in Russia these days is colder than the weather in Siberia. There is no brotherhood here at all.... https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891112226213462016/pu/img/Untas_xfV5egbEGY.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zelensky said at the Munich Security Conference on Saturday: "Yesterday here, the US Vice President made it clear that the decades-old relationship between Europe and the United States is coming to an end." Moscow will form 15 new divisions this year, with a total force greater than that of all European countries combined. Belarus will serve as a springboard. "From now on, things will be different, and Europe needs to adapt to this change." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891117094609289216/pu/img/9VRbGyyplAGIRtUa.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China registered 6.1 million marriages last year, a 45-year low.
A respondent from Henan said: I am now in my 50s and cannot find a job. If my children do not want to get married, I will be very supportive, because now the bride price is high, young people are under great pressure, raising children is not easy, and I do not have the financial ability. If I get seriously ill one day, I will die. "Let those rich officials have children, and ordinary people should not have children." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891119854335459328/pu/img/3vRMrdxH-ZnzH1hf.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiwanese media reported: Chinese cargo ships played patriotic songs to cover maritime channels in protest of Canadian warships passing through the Taiwan Strait. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891124613847113728/pu/img/cAIyMZop8d_C9OGF.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 16, criminal defense lawyer Wu Qiang said: The client was identified as an accomplice and coercive measures were taken just because he and the suspect had a history of cohabitation. However, in the interrogation record, the suspect clearly stated that the suspect had been engaged in fraudulent activities one year before the two of them lived together. In addition, the police also required the client to transfer the legal income in the account to the public account to compensate the victim of the fraud. The lawyer said, why should innocent people be blamed? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891125849023475712/pu/img/Yjg4onydp7KrOk1U.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the comment section, a netizen sent a private message to the Chinese Embassy in Cambodia 3 days ago, but has not received a response yet. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj6nKUWXcAA9ePq.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15, Heilongjiang. A BYD owner said that within 40 days of buying the car, the car had various problems. The previous Toyota had been driven for 12 years and 200,000 kilometers, and had never been repaired once, except for maintenance. And BYD vehicles waiting for repairs lined up in the after-sales service. "All of them are here to repair their cars, and there are too many to repair them." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891133221888536576/pu/img/gTUgE1jgOf1HBAU5.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 15, the Office of the Prime Minister of the Cook Islands announced that Prime Minister Brown and Chinese Premier Li Qiang signed the above agreement in Harbin, China.
The agreement will build a framework for bilateral cooperation in priority areas such as trade and investment, tourism, marine science, aquaculture, agriculture, climate infrastructure resilience and disaster preparedness.
Li Qiang said in a meeting with Brown on Friday that China firmly supports the people of the Cook Islands in independently choosing a development path that suits their national conditions, and is willing to work with the Cook Islands to strengthen high-quality joint construction of the "Belt and Road" and connect with the development strategy of the Cook Islands
The Cook Islands is an autonomous country, but it has long had a free association relationship with New Zealand. Cook Islanders hold New Zealand passports. New Zealand is also the largest aid donor to the Cook Islands and provides security support.
Brown announced his visit to China last week without consulting New Zealand in advance, and the content of the agreement signed with China was not notified to New Zealand in advance. Wellington has repeatedly asked the Cook Islands to share relevant agreements...
fullContent:
2月15日，库克群岛总理办公室宣布，总理布朗与中国总理李强在中国哈尔滨签署上述协议。
 这份协议将为贸易和投资、旅游、海洋科学、水产养殖、农业、气候基础设施韧性和备灾等优先领域，搭建一个双方合作的框架。
 李强星期五与布朗会面时说，中国坚定支持库克群岛人民自主选择适合自身国情的发展道路，愿同库方加强高质量共建“一带一路”，同库克群岛发展战略对接
 库克群岛是一个自治国家，但它长期与新西兰有自由联合关系。库克群岛居民持有新西兰护照。新西兰也是库克群岛的最大援助国，并提供安全支持。
 布朗上周宣布访华之行，事先未与新西兰磋商，与中国签订的协议内容也未先知会新西兰。惠灵顿多次要求库克群岛共享相关协议内容，但未得到有效回应，加剧了新西兰对中国在太平洋地区扩大影响力及对国家安全构成威胁的担忧。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the commander of the US Indo-Pacific Command, Paparo, said at the Honolulu National Defense Forum that China, Russia and North Korea have formed a "troublemaker triangle" that threatens the security of the Pacific region: "We see an emerging axis of dictatorship." He pointed out that China, Russia and North Korea coordinate in everything from joint bomber patrols to sharing anti-satellite capabilities and advanced submarine technology. He also warned that China's activities around Taiwan are not just simple exercises, but a real-life rehearsal for the military unification of Taiwan. He worries that these increasingly aggressive actions may be used as a "fig leaf" to cover up a surprise attack on Taiwan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 15 (Release) Someone posted a letter of complaint at the entrance of the cafeteria of Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications, reporting that Gao Zhihua, Party Secretary of the School of Materials Science and Engineering, Yang Daolin, Party Secretary of the School of Continuing Education and Applied Technology, and Zhang Yi, Party Secretary of the School of Automation and Artificial Intelligence, had violated laws and disciplines. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj6xNw6a0AAt4l9.png
